attributes.action: We the government to fix Hackney downs basketball court
attributes.additional_details: A lot of youth spend majority of their time at the court which helps to keep children and young adults away from knife crimes and violence.
attributes.background: We need lights for the court at night and also need new rims

rejection.details:
Responsibility for local amenities is a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also contact your local council directly. Find out how to influence decision making at Hackney Council here: https://hackney.gov.uk/calling-to-account
